text: Map of Massachusetts House of Representatives' 19th Suffolk district, 2013. Based on 2010 United States Census Massachusetts House of Representatives' 19th Suffolk district in the United States is one of 160 legislative districts included in the lower house of the Massachusetts General Court. It covers part of Suffolk County. Democrat Bob DeLeo of Winthrop has represented the district since 1995. ==Locales represented== Map of Massachusetts House of Representatives districts for Suffolk County, apportioned in 2011 The district includes the following localities: * part of Revere * Winthrop The current district geographic boundary overlaps with that of the Massachusetts Senate's 1st Suffolk and Middlesex district. ==Representatives== * Frank L. Brier, circa 1920 * Herbert W. Burr, circa 1920 * Elihu D. Stone, circa 1920 * William H. Monahan, circa 1888 * Thomas L. Noonan, circa 1888 * Walter D. Bryan, circa 1951 * Edmond J. Donlan, circa 1951 * William F. Sullivan, circa 1951 * W. Paul White, circa 1975 * William F. Galvin, 1979-1991 * Susan Tracy, 1991–1995 * Robert A. DeLeo, 1995-current ==See also== * List of Massachusetts House of Representatives elections * Other Suffolk County districts of the Massachusetts House of Representatives: 1st, 2nd, 3rd, 4th, 5th, 6th, 7th, 8th, 9th, 10th, 11th, 12th, 13th, 14th, 15th, 16th, 17th, 18th * List of Massachusetts General Courts * List of former districts of the Massachusetts House of Representatives ==Images== ;Portraits of legislators 1908 Florence Driscoll Massachusetts House of Representatives.png|Florence Driscoll 1908 Samuel Madden Massachusetts House of Representatives.png|Samuel Madden 1908 Thomas Fay Massachusetts House of Representatives.png|Thomas Fay 1918 Jacob Wasserman Massachusetts House of Representatives.png|Jacob Wasserman 1918 Thomas Leavitt Massachusetts House of Representatives.png|Thomas Leavitt 1923 Harrison Atwood Massachusetts House of Representatives.png|Harrison Atwood 1923 Richard McClennan Walsh Massachusetts House of Representatives.png|Richard McClennan Walsh 1923 William Arthur Fish Massachusetts House of Representatives.png|William Arthur Fish 1935 John White Massachusetts House of Representatives.png|John White 1935 Lawrence McHugh Massachusetts House of Representatives.png|Lawrence McHugh 1945 James Sullivan Massachusetts House of Representatives.png|James Sullivan 1945 Robert Connolly Massachusetts House of Representatives.png|Robert Connolly 1953 Charles Robert Doyle Massachusetts House of Representatives.png|Charles Robert Doyle 1953 Edmond Donlan Massachusetts House of Representatives.png|Edmond Donlan 1953 Joseph Michael OLoughlin Massachusetts House of Representatives.png|Joseph Michael O'Loughlin 1967 John Donovan Massachusetts House of Representatives.png|John Donovan 1975 W Paul White Massachusetts House of Representatives.png|W.
